<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGEN: do NOT edit in this block -->

**command: `/jumpto`**

**quick ref:**
> /jumpto [line_offset|end|begin]

**description:**

```
goto a given line or start or end of line
Examples: 
/if %name% == "0" /jumpto 3
/tip your name is NOT 0
/jumpto end
/tip your name is 0
```

<!-- END_AUTOGEN-->
转到指定的路线开始或结束。
